templates.name: Template for authorization content
templates.fileText:
"Dear $name
Your Authentication of UIN $uin using $authType on $date at $time Hrs $status at a device deployed by MOSIP Services"

templates.name: Template for authorization subject
templates.fileText: UIN $uin Authentication $status

templates.name: Template for authorization SMS
templates.fileText: Your Authentication of UIN $uin using $authType on $date at $time Hrs $status at a device deployed by MOSIP Services.

templates.name: Template for Email Content
templates.fileText:
"Dear $name
OTP for UIN  $uin is $otp and is valid for $validTime minutes. (Generated on $date at $time Hrs)"

templates.name: Template for Email Subject
templates.fileText: UIN $uin: OTP Request

templates.name: Template for OTP in SMS
templates.fileText: OTP for UIN  $uin is $otp and is valid for $validTime minutes. (Generated on $date at $time Hrs)

templates.name: Template for duplicate UIN Email
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your Request for Registration $RID has failed because an UIN has been found against your details. Please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team"

templates.name: Template for duplicate UIN SMS
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your Request for Registration $RID has failed because an UIN has been found against your details. Please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances"

templates.name: Template for Technical Issue Email
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your Request for Registration $RID has failed because of an Technical issue please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team"

templates.name: Template for Technical Issue SMS
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your Request for Registration $RID has failed because of an Technical issue please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances"

templates.name: Template for UIN generation Email
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your UIN for the Registration $RID has been successfully generated and will reach soon at your Postal Address.

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team"

templates.name: Template for UIN generation SMS
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your UIN for the Registration $RID has been successfully generated and will reach soon at your Postal Address."

templates.name: Template for update details Email
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your UIN details have been updated corresponding to the Registration Number $RID and a Physical Copy of your UIN will reach you soon at your Postal Address.

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team"

templates.name: Template for update Details SMS
templates.fileText:
"Hi $name,
Your UIN details have been updated corresponding to the Registration Number $RID and a Physical Copy of your UIN will reach you soon at your Postal Address."

templates.name: Template for new registration Email Content
templates.description: Template for new registration Email Content
templates.fileText:
"Dear $name, 
Thank you for registering with the digital identity platform. Your registration id is $RegistrationID. If there are any corrections to be made in your details, please contact the Registration centre within the next 4 days."

templates.fileText:

templates.name: Template for Email Acknowledgement
templates.fileText:
"Dear $name,
Your Pre-Registration for UIN is Completed Successfully
on $Date at $Time. Your ID is #$PRID.
Appointment is scheduled for $Appointmentdate at $Appointmenttime.
you will also receive the details on your registered Mobile Number"

templates.name: Template for Onscreen Acknowledgment
templates.fileText:
"Name                 :$Individual Name
Pre Registration ID    :$PRID
Registration Centre    :$Registration Centre
Centre Contact Number  :$Contact Number

Important Guidelines

2.$Guideline 2
3.$Guideline 3
4.$Guideline 4
5.$Guideline 5
6.$Guideline 6
7.$Guideline 7
8.$Guideline 8
9.$Guideline 9
